longtext: And now you take some good eggs, and for two people you take two eggs.
To this, you don't add any, any, any cream.
So this is the beginning of the sauce.
So we put a little bit of parmesan.
And this is the sauce.
In Roma, they use also pecorino cheese, which is a cheese to be grated.
Abundant pepper.
To be a little bit naughty, I take just the yolk, and we beat it.
I wouldn't put any salt here because the bacon here is quite salty, it's preserved.
There are fresh pecorino and aged pecorino.
